Riot please make it so we can see out items from our match history again without having to open up a new tab. The tab is cool and all but sometimes we just want to see someones build and not the whole game stats. Keep up the good work Riot.
Yes. I want to look at something really quick, not open up chrome  and have to view everything. Love the in-depth match history but sometimes I just want simple.
Make it so we can quick look but if we want full game stats we can click on a button and it will take to match history in depth in the browser so we can get the best of both worlds :) <3
FINALLY! THE TEN PEOPLE WHO PLAY {{champion:266}} , INCLUDING MYSELF, CAN NOW DO SO IN STYLE!
THERE IS LITERALLY A DOZEN OF US
THE {{champion:266}}  ARMY!

Is Riot getting bad at math?

{{item:3508}} costs 750g more for +20 AD? I get 20 AD from 2 long swords and that costs me only 720g. That is a buff for the slot efficency, **but a nerf for the items gold efficency and the build path** (you need 3.4k gold before you ever get to the mana).


**I do no know what Riot thought when they changed the item this way, but it was definitely not about improving the item.**

The gold efficency is now 110% down from 114% without the passive, what is not that good for such a niche item.

* With their current version, I would impelemt a pre-item that builds out of a long sword + vamp scepter and gives 20 AD, 8% LS and 1% of your dmg dealt from basic attacks to mana for 800 + 360 + 40g (1200g).
* Then upgrade it with BF to the current form: BF (1550) + pre-item (1200) + 450g (for +10 AD and +1-7% dmg to mana) = 3200g.
Or is it that we are getting too good at math? {{champion:161}}_{{champion:161}}

I hate it when people automatically assume lucian is dead after a nerf. If anything they buffed him, he can be more mobile than ever with the lightslinger cd reduct on e, not to mention he can do at the cost of 0 mana. they didn't reduce range on q just the cast range so now it'll take more skill to play him, i see this more of an overall buff to lucian and promotes a slightly different play style because of the range nerf. His wave clear is better now that his q cost less and dmges more minions. {{champion:236}} "Keep Movin' On" {{champion:236}}
omg. did you just suggest people try to adapt? WITH MORE SKILL REQUIRED?
Adapt... and play with skill? wtf is this?
PLEASE stop removing people from roles they are not even OP at.  What is gained from removing Ali's ability to jungle?

Alistar jungle is famous for being one of the most toxic picks in League history. His ganks consisted of ulting, then headbutting you out of your own tower while taking minimal damage. Your only option was to hide so far back, you couldn't farm. It fell waaaaay out of style, but they didn't want anybody getting ideas.
Yeah it may have sucked back then, but it didn't suck now.  "Your only option was to hide so far back, you couldn't farm."  So how is that different from going up against a Blitz or Thresh main?
You can't hide behind minions against Alistar.
I always play {{champion:12}} jungle. RIP Cow

All I wanted to hear about the jungle timers was this. "Timers will only start tracking a camp if you or a teammate directly witness a monster camp being fully cleared (similar to minimap icons)" That makes me happy.
Just goes to show everyone who was against jungle timers are challenged and can't read.
im sorry about what obama did to you :(
I'm not American, but I thought it was Bush?

It was Bush, but don't let the Republicans know that. They still live in a delusional world where Ronald Reagan is the paragon of conservatism. If he knew what the Tea Party movement was advocating, he'd denounce it. Bush actually ruined the US economy, but it makes some people feel better to blame it on a black guy from the other party who was handed a crashing economy to begin with. It didn't magically crash because a black guy touched it. It took a few years of frivolous military spending to dig a hole this deep.

It was Obama, but don't let the Democrats know that. They still live in a delusional world where Bill Clinton is the paragon of liberalism. If he knew what the Tea Party movement was advocating, he'd love it. Obama actually ruined the US economy, but it makes some people feel better to blame it on a white guy from the other party who was handed a crashing economy to begin with. It didn't magically crash because a conservative touched it. It took a few years of frivolous domestic spending to dig a hole this deep. 7 trillion dollars in two years. And $20 trillion by 2016 as it stands.

How can this make you happy? Most junglers dont track timers, hell there are diamonds who consistently tell me i do not need to track timers to get to diamond, and they main the position. Who cares if you have to see the buff, junglers at high elo already get sightstone, so they place a ward at each buff at the 6:30 mark, and 5 minutes after, its easy. Congrats you just made the counter jungling game trivial for everyone. Only casuals will be happy about this, anyone who plays this competitively looks at this and goes, wtf. Put it in normals, i dont care, but to put it in ranked when there are DOMINATING junglers such as udyr, or lee sin, who will counterjungle if they can, its stupid. And no, to the guy who posted that people are challenged and cant read if they dont like this, that isnt the case. Ranked isnt an environment that is meant to be trivial.....
You take a video game way too seriously

League's whole selling point is a game that can be played casual but is competitve at its core and complex...This is a dumbing down of the competitive scene and a plus for the casuals....DQ said nothing incorrect, he was just a d*ck about it.

i don't get that excuse of this is dumbing down the competitive scene.

In the competitive scene buff timing is kept at the very least in the early to mid game most of the time and having the timers usually presents interesting interactions between teams, for the competitive scene i only see this as assuring such interactions continue into the late game where buffs become much more lax on the take regardless of whether teams have spawn timers or not.

What i see this doing is actually encouraging jungle invades and jungle defence because its easier for all players to be in on the buff wars in soloq, with this things like warding buffs for your jungler or even warding entrances becomes much more important at all levels of play thereby simply increasing the importance of already present GAMEPLAY mechanics and reducing the importance of the maths part and also slightly of map awareness in the lower elo (as after silver i doubt anyone with vision of a buff will fail to let someone know it was taken when it is)
Is was always like this. They were never intending to give away information you would not have gained otherwise.

It was hardly a nerf.. He got extra base attack damage for a solid early game while his E got major buffs. This just means he'll need to go in deeper, which shouldn't matter if played correctly because his E will now basically always be up when needed.
